name: Whisker Mortis (call363)
description:
A long time ago, in a far away land, lived a mysterious Knight. This Knight would soon be scorned by an evil King, who imprsoned all the cats in the land. Taking up his sword, the Knight set out on a quest to rescue all the cats the vile King locked away.

In Whisker Mortis, you play as the Knight, who goes around the King's keep, kills his guards and frees the cats. Use your fast, cat-like reflexes to pick up weapons and strike down your enemies. Bash open the cages, bash open the skulls of your enemies and bash the King, once and for all.

Noah Alex Hunter: Team Lead

Janko Zorbas: Lead Artist

William Olav Karlsen: Designer/Artist

Tomass Sepetis: Designer

Aleksis Bojaruns: Programmer
